code: import'./RegisterPage.css';import{useState}from"react";import RegisterButton from"../components/RegisterButton";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RegisterPage=()=>{const validateField=(fieldName,value)=>{const namePattern=/^[A-Za-z]+$/;const emailPattern=/^[\w-.]+@([\w-]+\.)+[\w-]{2,4}$/;switch(fieldName){case'firstName':return
